short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that grants the user the option to remove a YouTube's video end screen elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vanish is an extension that allows you to remove those sometimes annoying end screen elements on YouTube such as channels or video suggestions. Just toggle a simple switch and you are good to go!
